pages.text: The $(item)Environmental Controller$() can be used to 'infuse' an area with various effects. $(thing)Up to Seven Effects$() can be supported at the same time, but this increases power usage.
The Controller's GUI

The UI has several elements of note. $(br2)On the left are seven $(item)Module Slots$(), where active modules are inserted. $(br2)Along the top is a slider to specify the machine's radius of operation, and below are boxes for the minimum and maximum Y levels.

Below this is the filter, where you can name players to either receive or be immune from the modules' effects. The filter has seven modes: All mobs and players, Blacklist Players, Whitelist Players, Passive Mobs, Hostile Mobs, or Hostile And Passive Mobs. $(br2)Lastly, we have a button for Redstone Control (On to activate, Off to activate, or Ignored) and a power meter at the bottom left.
